Package com.company.ems.test

Class EmployeeManagerTest

java.lang.Object
com.company.ems.test.EmployeeManagerTest
public class EmployeeManagerTest extends Object
Test class for EmployeeManager.

This class contains unit tests to verify the functionality of the EmployeeManager class, specifically testing its Singleton behavior and the ability to add and retrieve employees.

The tests ensure that only one instance of EmployeeManager is created (Singleton pattern) and that employees can be properly managed.

  • Constructor Details

    • EmployeeManagerTest

  • Method Details

    • testSingletonBehavior

      @Test public void testSingletonBehavior()
      Test method to verify Singleton behavior in EmployeeManager.

      This test ensures that only one instance of EmployeeManager is created, and that multiple calls to getInstance() return the same object.

      It uses the assertSame method to check that two calls to EmployeeManager.getInstance() return the same reference.

    • testAddAndRetrieveEmployee

      @Test public void testAddAndRetrieveEmployee()
      Test method to verify that an employee can be added to the EmployeeManager and then retrieved.

      This test ensures that an employee can be added to the EmployeeManager and successfully retrieved by their ID.

      It creates a new FullTimeEmployee, assigns it an ID, adds it to the manager, and verifies that the employee is successfully retrieved using the getEmployee() method.
